messages.title: We're backing Adrian
messages.content: Thousands of people from across the constituency have told us they're voting for a Green MP.

issues.environment: Having a Green MP would bring a fresh approach to politics, putting both the people and the environment first.
issues.governance: Beginning to restore faith in politics, starting with reforming and revitalising our democracy.

housing.content: Policies to revive the economy and protect the environment create a fairer society in an integrated way.

endorsements.endorsement: Ashley, Plumtree Close, Thorpe St Andrew.
Dawn Castle-Green, former LibDem City Councillor, Old Palace Road.
Paul McAlenan, former LibDem City Councillor, Clarendon Close.
Susan Curran, former City Councillor, Labour, Drayton High Road.
Andy Faley, former City Councillor, Labour, Drayton High Road.

images.caption: Campaign leaflet image showing Adrian Ramsay, the Green Party logo, and various endorsements from constituents.

leaflet.additionalNotes: If you are supporting Adrian Ramsay at this election, please display this poster in your window. If you would prefer to have a dayglo poster, or would like a poster board for your garden, please e-mail poster@norwichgreenparty.org.uk or phone (01603) 611909.
